snippet: Mr. Ambrose was President Richard M. Nixon’s first drug czar, but resigned before he could take the helm of the new government arm he had helped shepherd into being, the Drug Enforcement Administration.
abstract: Myles J Ambrose, who was President Richard M Nixon’s first drug czar, but who resigned before he could take the helm of the the Drug Enforcement Administration, the new government arm he had helped shepherd into being, dies at age 87.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Ambrose was President Richard M. Nixon’s first drug czar, but resigned before he could take the helm of the new government arm he had helped shepherd into being, the Drug Enforcement Administration.

headline.main: Myles J. Ambrose, Nixon Drug Czar, D.E.A. Midwife, Dies at 87
headline.print_headline: M. J. Ambrose, 87, D.E.A.’s Midwife, Dies
